tweet: We're excited to announce our partnership with Chainlink. Our ongoing collaboration will enable Matic to leverage the @chainlink decentralised oracle network, facilitating access to real-world data for any smart contracts running on Matic. Read more:  https://t.co/qbYgRlyaQP
